meanings.definition: One who slaughters animals for food.
meanings.sent1: The slaughterer prepared the meat for the market.
meanings.sent2: The skilled slaughterer worked efficiently at the abattoir.
meanings.sent3: The hungry slaughterer accidentally cooked too much meat for dinner.
meanings.sent4: The slaughterer of time wasted no opportunity to be productive.
meanings.sent5: The diligent slaughterer ensured every part of the animal was used.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that slaughters.
meanings.sent1: The slaughterer of dreams crushed his hopes.
meanings.sent2: The mysterious slaughterer left a trail of destruction behind.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy slaughterer accidentally broke the vase.
meanings.sent4: The relentless slaughterer of enemies never showed mercy.
meanings.sent5: The ruthless slaughterer of joy extinguished all happiness around.
